ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( If(includes( Select_User__c,"Sameer" ),1,0)+ If(includes( Select_User__c,"Ranjan" ),1,0)+ If(includes( Select_User__c,"Subhajit" ),1,0)+ If(includes( Select_User__c,"Shubham" ),1,0)+ If(includes( Select_User__c,"Prajwal" ),1,0))>2
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't Select More than two value.
